questions.question_text: "venue" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A place where an event takes place
A list of event participants
A type of performance
A temporary stage
questions.example_sentence: The festival venue will be the newly renovated Riverside Plaza.
questions.explanation:
イベントが開催される場所
参加者リスト
パフォーマンスの種類
仮設ステージ

questions.question_text: "participation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of taking part in an activity
A fee required to enter an event
A detailed program schedule
A complaint about an event
questions.example_sentence: Local residents are encouraged to increase their participation in the festival.
questions.explanation:
参加すること
入場料
イベントのスケジュール
イベントに対する苦情

questions.question_text: "booth" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A small stand or stall used for selling or displaying items
A ticket counter inside a station
A large performance hall
A museum storage room
questions.example_sentence: Artists can apply for a booth to showcase their work.
questions.explanation:
（物販や展示の）小さなブース
駅のチケット売り場
大ホール
保管室

questions.question_text: "highlight" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The most important or exciting part of an event
A ticket discount for students
A rule set by the event organizers
A late-night performance
questions.example_sentence: One highlight of the festival will be the live painting demonstration.
questions.explanation:
最も重要／魅力的な見どころ
学生割引
主催者の規則
深夜の公演

questions.question_text: "registration" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The process of signing up or enrolling
A payment made after an event ends
A printed map of the venue
A survey about the event audience
questions.example_sentence: Booth registration must be completed by June 20.
questions.explanation:
登録・申し込み
イベント後の支払い
会場の地図
観客調査
